mapper.select: SELECT p.permission_id as id, p.permission_url as url, p.url_type as urlType FROM tab_sys_permission p WHERE p.permission_id IN ( SELECT sp.perssion_id FROM tab_sys_role_permission sp WHERE sp.role_id IN ( SELECT ur.role_id FROM tab_sys_user_role ur WHERE ur.user_id = 3 ) ) AND p.is_deleted = 0
